api.name: mlsSearch
api.description: Search for real estate properties using MLS data with various criteria including location, price, bedrooms, property type, and status.

mls_number.description: Find a specific listing by its MLS number/ID (e.g., 'A11788244').

address.description: Search by full or partial address.

street.description: Filter for listings on a specific street.

property_type.description: Filter by public record property type (e.g., 'SFR', 'CONDO', 'MFR', 'LAND', 'MOBILE', 'OTHER').

living_area_min.description: Minimum living area in square feet.

living_area_max.description: Maximum living area in square feet.

lot_size.description: Exact lot size in square feet.

lot_size_min.description: Minimum lot size in square feet.

lot_size_max.description: Maximum lot size in square feet.

year_built.description: Exact year the property was built.

has_pool.description: Filter for properties with a pool.

has_basement.description: Filter for properties with a basement.

is_water_view.description: Filter for properties with water views.

is_city_view.description: Filter for properties with city views.

is_mountain_view.description: Filter for properties with mountain views.

is_park_view.description: Filter for properties with park views.

stories.description: Exact number of stories in the building.

has_photos.description: Filter for properties that have photos.

latitude.description: Latitude for location-based search. Requires longitude and radius.

longitude.description: Longitude for location-based search. Requires latitude and radius.

radius.description: Search radius in miles for location-based search.

size.description: Number of results to return (1-250, default: 5).

resultIndex.description: Pagination index for fetching subsequent pages.

include_photos.description: Include full photo list in response. Set to true for UI.

examples.name: Find property by MLS number
examples.description: Look up a specific property by its MLS ID/number.

examples.name: Find active houses in Miami, FL under $1M with 3+ beds
examples.description: Search for active single-family residential properties in Miami, Florida under $1,000,000 with at least 3 bedrooms.

examples.name: Find sold condos in 33139 between $500k-$800k
examples.description: Search for sold condos in zip code 33139 between $500,000 and $800,000.

examples.name: Find waterfront properties in FL with a pool, built after 2010
examples.description: Search for waterfront properties in Florida that have a pool and were built in 2010 or later.

api.name: getPropertyDetails
api.description: Get detailed information about a specific property by MLS ID (Uses MLSSearch with mls_number parameter)

propertyId.description: The MLS ID of the property to retrieve (e.g., 'A11788244')

meta.description: Search for real estate properties using RealEstateAPI MLS data with detailed filtering
meta.title: MLS Property Search (RealEstateAPI)

systemRole:
You are a real estate assistant with access to MLS property data via the RealEstateAPI. When users ask about properties, use the appropriate function based on their query:

1. FOR SPECIFIC MLS NUMBER/ID SEARCHES: When a user asks for a specific MLS listing (e.g., A11788244, #A11788244), use either:
   - mlsSearch with mls_number parameter: mlsSearch({ mls_number: 'A11788244', include_photos: true })
   - OR getPropertyDetails function: getPropertyDetails({ propertyId: 'A11788244' })

2. FOR GENERAL PROPERTY SEARCHES: Use mlsSearch with appropriate parameters based on their query criteria. For example:
   - To find active houses in Miami: mlsSearch({ city: 'Miami', state: 'FL', status: 'Active', include_photos: true })
   - To find properties under $500k: mlsSearch({ listing_price_max: 500000, include_photos: true })
   - To find properties with specific features: mlsSearch({ bedrooms_min: 3, bathrooms_min: 2, has_pool: true, include_photos: true })

Always include the include_photos parameter set to true for better visualization. Use all relevant search parameters to narrow down results based on user's requirements.
